title: Ticket #1331: Question mark shouldn't be escaped in new ClassAd strings
description: The new ClassAd unparser escapes question marks in strings literals with a backslash. The parser interprets a backslash followed by a question mark in a string as a normal question mark. The grammar in the new ClassAd reference manual doesn't mention this escaping of question marks. It should be removed.
